column2: "Nna Job buaa no dɛ
column6: Na wɔdze m’amandzehu eegu nsɛn mu!"

column2: "Na afei nkyɛ ɔbɛyɛ dur asen mpoano anhwea: Dɛm ntsi na me nsɛm ayɛ yerɛyerɛw yi."
"Osiandɛ Otumfo no n’egyen menaba tuatua mo mu
column3: Mo sunsum ronom no mu bɔr: Nyankopɔn ho hu aba mo do mpasuar."

column2: "Ana hamu asoaso paapaa mu aber a ɔwɔ efunoma? Anaa nantwi bobɔ mu su wɔ n’aforafora edziban do?"
"Anaa edziban tabrabaa wokwetsi nkyen dzi? Anaa dɛw bi wɔ nkyirefuwa mu fufuw mu?"
"Me kra pow dɛ ɔdze nsa bɛka; Ɔtse dɛ edziban a ɔyɛ nkɔw dze ma me."
"Ao
column3: kɛtseankyɛ meenya m’ebisadze; Na nkyɛ Nyankopɔn dze adze a mo kɔn dɔ no aama me."

column2: "Sɛ nkyɛ Nyankopɔn bɛpɛ dɛ ɔdwerew me; Na ogyaa ne nsamu
column3: na otwa me kyen mpo a!"

column2: "Ɔno nkyɛ mibenya awerɛkyekyer dɛ; Nyew
column3: nkyɛ mibedzi ehurusi wɔ yaw a ɔso noho: Dɛ mummbuu Krɔnkrɔnnyi kor no ne nsɛm do."

column2: "Naaso m’ahoɔdzen wɔ hen
column3: dɛ medze mobɔtweɔn? Na m’enyidado nye dɛn

column2: "Ana m’ahoɔdzen yɛ abo ahoɔdzen? Anaa mo honam yɛ boran?"
"Ana nnyɛ mboa bi na minnyi no wɔ mo mu
column3: Na woetu nyansa pa efi mo mu koraa?"

column2: "Nyia ɔrotɔ bitsi no
column3: ɔsɛ dɛ onya ne nyɛnko nsamu ayamuyie; Mekyerɛ nyia ɔpow Otumfo no no suro no."

column2: "Mo nuanom etwa nkontompɔ dɛ ɔwora
column3: Dɛ suka mu nwora a ɔsen twa mu kɔ a"

column2: "Nsudaa ntsi n’enyi ebir
column3: Na esukwankyɛba suma noho wɔ mu:"

column2: "Mber a ɔhyew ka no no
column3: ɔhera: Ahohur ber mu ɔsa wɔ n’ananmu."

column2: "Akwantsemfo a wodua n’akwan mu dan fa nkyɛn: Wɔkɔ framfram no mu
"Tema akwantsemfo no hwehwɛe. Seba akwantsemfo ekuwekuw no dze enyi too do."
"Hɔn enyi wui dɛ wɔdze hɔn enyi too do; Wokodur hɔ
"Na dɛmara na hom so hom tse; Hom ehu m’amandzehu yi
column3: naaso hom nnyi tsema biara ma me."

column2: "Ana mase dɛ
column4: emi ntsi hom mfa hom ahodze mu bi nkyɛ?"

column2: "Anaa
column3: hom ngye me mfi ɔyɛfo nsamu? Na
column4: hom mpon me mfi ahyɛdofo nsamu anaa?"

column2: "Hom nkyerɛkyerɛ me
column3: na mubomua m’ano: Na hom mma munhu dza mafom wɔ mu."

column2: "Mbrɛ nsɛm tsenenee dua na ɔyɛ dzen a: Na hom atsɛnyiyi yi dze otwuw ebɛnadze enyim?"
"Ana hom susu dɛ wobotwuw nsɛm enyim? Osiandɛ nyia n’enyi aber no ne nsɛm tse dɛ mframa."
"Nyew
column3: hom twe tonto wɔ egyanka mpo do
column4: Na hom dze hom nyɛnko yɛ eguadze."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei hom mpɛ dɛ wɔbɛgyen enyi ahwɛ me; Na ampaara mirinndzi ator wɔ hom enyim."
"Meserɛ hom
column4: mma mma ntɛnkyew bi mmba; Nyew

column2: "Ana ntɛnkyew bi wɔ me gyirama do? Ana mo nhumu nntum nnhu ebusudze mu?"
